channel.title: OEM+ XJ Build on Eddie Abbondanzio
channel.description: Recent content in OEM+ XJ Build on Eddie Abbondanzio

item.title: Fixing All The Mechanical Issues
item.description: With a rough idea of what it’d take to fix up the damage I decided to switch focus and tackle all the mechanical / electrical issues before diving into the bodywork.

item.title: Buying a Second XJ From Across the US
item.description: Back in June of 2024, the night before I was due to fly out to Colorado for a work trip I couldn’t resist sifting through the Denver Craigslist to see what I could find.
